channel.title: Forum Resistance 2:Electric Boogaloo UPick (0-0) [1st Dance Off!]
channel.description:
# It's the 70s and a new craze called "Disco" is sweeping the Imperial Nation! People are choosing what they want to be, and for the fun of it people are making a new and improved Resistance movement after everyone got bored of the last one
*SPECIAL SHIT* Once you join, send me a DM on the forums with a class name, it can be as serious or silly as you want, I decide the alignment and special abilities though. Also guess what, because I am nice, this will be a bastard game!
**How to do the thangs (And boogie)**
1.There is a random leader and he chooses what people to go on the mission. (They can choose themselves) 2. After the leader has chosen the necessary amount of people, everybody, votes PRIVATLY on whether or not the mission should go in their rolecard thread. The option with the most amount of votes is what happens. 3. If the majority says yes. The mission happens… The Resistance members who are not spies must say it succeeds. IF there is a spy the can choose for it to fail. One fail card can fail the mission If it succeeds the resistance gets a point. If it fails the spies get a point. The first to thee points to win. IF the majority says no. The leader ships passes down. 5 rejected missions in a row and the spies automatically win.
SIGNUPS 1. @Wolfy 2. @Simon 3. @newarkinvaders 4. @PolikShadowbliss 5. @Ashe - **Leader** 6. @PokemonKidRyan 7. @Unknown 8. @_PG_Felgurity 9. @Hippolytus 10. @Icibalus
**Back-Ups** Rogue Ben_Pollard
You all know the drill for signing up! Lets have fun, blow up some Imperials, and most importantly BOOGIE!
**Boogie Party Time Stamps** [The Party is Preparing! [Setup Phase]](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-resistance-2-electric-boogaloo-upick-10-10-party-prep-phase/10928/32) [The First Dance Off!](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-resistance-2-electric-boogaloo-upick-10-10-1st-dance-off/10928/64)
**Amount of times Noz fucked up:1**
